overview:
Keyideas is a leading strategic IT partner for companies across US, Europe, Latin America and India. We provide IT Services and Software Solutions to organizations ranging from Fortune 500 companies to large federal clients like Indian Navy.

Working with start-up IT products companies is another focus area at Keyideas. We provide IT Product companies the expertise on Product Development and also help them on Market Intelligence to make their products successful in the long term.

We offer following services :

  • Application Development Services: PHP, .NET, Java, Joomla, Wordpress, Magento, SEO, SEM
  • Independent Testing Services
  • Product Engineering: Outsourced Product centers, Product Testing
  • Specialized Services: Technology Consulting, Application Services

Our company believes in long term relationships with clients based on deep understanding of their needs. We provide our clients the best technical expertise and sound IT strategy advice they need to make a business impact.
